policies.title: Performance Claims Pre-Approval
policies.rule: All performance claims require Legal/Compliance pre-approval before publication.

policies.title: Superlative Prohibition
policies.rule: Superlatives ('best', 'leading', '#1', 'top', 'superior') are prohibited without documented third-party source dated within 12 months.

policies.title: Risk Disclosure Proximity
policies.rule: Benefit statements require adjacent risk disclosure within same paragraph or bullet group. Maximum separation: 2 sentences.

policies.title: Hedge Language Requirements
policies.rule: Forward-looking statements must include 'may', 'could', 'seeks to', or equivalent hedge. 'Will' and 'shall' are prohibited for outcome statements.

policies.title: Context Completeness
policies.rule: Performance comparisons must specify: (1) benchmark name, (2) time period, (3) gross/net of fees, (4) source if third-party.
